attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of bailing out failing banks the Government should be bailing out people failed by the banks.
This would be an investment. 

All other fiscal measure, including quantitative  easing, funding of pfi schemes, creating a bad bank, and tinkering with flaky regulatory schemes, are  acts of desperation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
